title: Patch Notes
content: im. Fixed a potential soft-lock where using a melee attack on something in the environment that's too high to reach (like a wall turret or a dangling cocoon) could block your movement until the action was interrupted. Fixed an issue causing the Attack of Opportunity arrow to not be visible on Mac. Fixed reflected damage knocking out player characters when non-lethal damage is toggled on.
